authors.bio: Hello guys. I'm Phuc and I'm a passionate Software Engineer and also a Javascript lover. When I was a fresher, there are so many concerns about Software Engineer's life. So I decided to write this blog to help people who feel the same as me before.
authors.name: Phuc Dang

group.title: Tập làm thợ code P1 - Sự bắt đầu
group.author: Phuc Dang
group.excerpt: Mình đã bắt đầu tiếp xúc với lập trình như thế nào
